definition: the empty city stratagem (in which Zhuge Liang presents himself as unperturbed while making it evident that his city is undefended, hoping his adversary will suspect an ambush)/double bluff
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
lit. to sing “The Empty City Stratagem” (idiom)/fig. to put up a bluff to conceal one's weakness/(jocularly) (of a place etc) to be empty/(of one's stomach) to be rumbling

sentences.english: The only problem I have with my mailbox lately is that it's often empty.
sentences.chinese: 最近我遇到的唯一個難題是我的郵箱常常唱空城計。

sentences.english: The only problem I have with my mailbox lately is that it’s often empty.
sentences.chinese: 最近我遇到的唯一個難題是我的郵箱常常唱空城計。

sentences.english: The most interesting episode is the Empty-town Plan of Mr.
sentences.chinese: 感觸最深的是諸葛亮的空城計。

sentences.english: We can't leave no one to keep an eye on things.
The Empty City Trick presents a kind of seesaw movement between the works and the viewers.
sentences.chinese: “空城計”上演了一場作品與觀者之間的拉鋸運動。

definition: to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: white face/face painting in Beijing opera etc
lit. chickens flying and dogs jumping (idiom)/fig. in chaos/in disarray
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
the trick of injuring oneself to gain the enemy's confidence/CL:條|条[tiao2]
to rob the rich to help the poor
lit. reincarnated in sb else's body (idiom); fig. a discarded or discredited idea returns in another guise
lit. the lioness from Hedong roars (idiom)/fig. refers to a shrewish wife or a henpecked husband
